titleInfo.title: Metro Metronome award presented to Johnny Cash by Nashville Mayor Beverly Briley, 1969 November 20

mods.identifier: RG 3 4093 Johnny Cash w Mayor Briley Nov20 1969 001

location.physicalLocation: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library

mods.abstract: Pictured from left to right: Nashville Mayor Beverly Briley posing with country singer Johnny Cash, who was presented the “Metronome” award on November 20th, 1969, “for the outstanding contribution to the development of Music City, USA.” Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.

titleInfo.title: Record Group 3 Metro Davidson County Photographer

mods.accessCondition: U.S. and international copyright laws protect this digital content, which is provided for educational purposes only and may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed for any other purpose without written permission. Please contact the Metro Archives, Nashville Public Library, 615 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 37219. Telephone (615) 862-5880.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS 3.5 from a qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America, using a stylesheet available at https://github.com/utkdigitalinitiatives/DLTN. Metadata originally created in a locally modified version of qualified Dublin Core using ContentDM (data dictionary available: https://wiki.lib.utk.edu/display/DPLA.)
